sentences.en: A few colourful dragon - flies even carne to flit over the puddles in the tenement yard.

sentences.en: Firecrackers began to pop , and the dragon danced more wildly, as if angered.

sentences.en: Indra smashed through Vritra ninety - nine fortresses, and then came upon the dragon.

sentences.en: No one came into Dragon King Temple without breaking into a cold sweat.

sentences.en: The Dragon Boat Festival is one of three major Chinese holidays, along with the Spring and Moon Festivals.

sentences.en: The dragon dance troupe , beating drums and cymbals, entered the outer compound.

sentences.en: To the pounding beat of the drums and cymbals, the dragon began to dance.
